note:
I'm an academic, currently lapsed and sheltering due to lack of COVID mitigations. I've also spent many years working as a political staffer, researcher and tech writer. My PhD is in feminism and literature and my fiction is published in literary journals. Pre-pandemic I was an avid traveller, but I'm now trying to stay sane by veggie gardening, puppy wrangling and working on unfinished novels. I live in Brisbane, Australia.

Fiction and academia account: Samellat@c.im
